attributes.name: Inferno Scan
attributes.description: Hello everyone, Greetings, manga enthusiasts, language aficionados, and kindred spirits! We are thrilled to have you join our vibrant community, Inferno Scan, where our collective passion for manga knows no bounds. Inferno Scan is a group of dedicated individuals who share a common mission: to unlock the captivating world of manga for people of all languages through the incredible art of translation. Just as a hero answers the call to save the day, our heroes embark on the heroic job of translation, ensuring that the joy, emotion, and storytelling within the pages of manga can be experienced by readers from diverse linguistic backgrounds. Here at Inferno Scan, we understand that the universal language of storytelling transcends borders. It's our belief that everyone, regardless of their native tongue, deserves to immerse themselves in the rich narratives and dazzling artwork found in manga. We are united by our commitment to breaking down language barriers, one scan at a time, and making these captivating stories accessible to all. Whether you're a translator, proofreader, typesetter, or simply a manga enthusiast, Inferno Scan welcomes you with open arms. This is a place where talent, dedication, and the sheer love for manga come together. Our tight-knit community is filled with creative minds who bring diverse manga series to life in multiple languages. So, whether you're looking to join our team, discuss your favorite manga, or simply enjoy the camaraderie of fellow manga lovers, Inferno Scan is your new home. Our community thrives on collaboration, and we're excited to have you here as part of our quest to share the world of manga with a global audience. Thank you for being a part of our journey. Together, we'll continue to make the magical world of manga accessible to all. Get ready to embark on a wonderful adventure of storytelling with us at Inferno Scans!

attributes.name: Neon_Scans
attributes.description: Greetings, fellow manga enthusiasts!  Welcome to Neon Scans, where a group of passionate rookies embark on an exciting journey to bring you the enchanting world of manga in new and immersive ways!  Neon Scans may be young and inexperienced, but what we lack in years, we make up for with unwavering enthusiasm and an insatiable thirst for learning and growth. As newcomers to the manga translation scene, we humbly seek to introduce ourselves to the vibrant manga community, where creativity and imagination know no bounds.

attributes.name: Flame Scans
attributes.description:
**Flame Scans is a scanlation group, that dedicates itself to creating comic translations for Mangas, Manhwas, And Manhuas!**   


---

  
**We currently do:**  
-Solo Leveling  
-Omniscient Reader  
-A Returner's Magic Should Be Special  
-The Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Defend the Dungeon  
-Dungeon Reset  
-Trinity Seven  
-Berserk of Gluttony  
-Unnamed Memory  
- Spring's Espresso  
-The Villainess Is a Marionette  
-My Wife is Actually The Empress?  
-The Reincarnated Inferior Magic Swordsman  


---

  
**Links**  
Patreon Link:   
<https://www.patreon.com/flamescans>  
PayPal Link:  
<https://www.paypal.me/flamescan>  
Ko-Fi Link:  
<https://ko-fi.com/flamescans>  
Website link:  
<https://flamescans.org>  
Discord Link:  
<https://discord.gg/flamescans>
<https://discord.gg/M6wcq6ZPQg>

attributes.name: Flame Scans
attributes.description:
**Flame Scans is a scanlation group, that dedicates itself to creating comic translations for Mangas, Manhwas, And Manhuas!**   


---

  
**We currently do:**  
-Solo Leveling  
-Omniscient Reader  
-A Returner's Magic Should Be Special  
-The Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Defend the Dungeon  
-Dungeon Reset  
-Trinity Seven  
-Berserk of Gluttony  
-Unnamed Memory  
- Spring's Espresso  
-The Villainess Is a Marionette  
-My Wife is Actually The Empress?  
-The Reincarnated Inferior Magic Swordsman
